mapper.select: select h.name as hotelName, to_char('r.reg_date', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regDate, cleanliness, comfort, location, facilities, staff from review r, hotel h where r.hotel_no = h.no and r.user_no = #{ userNo }
mapper.insert: insert into review values(review_seq.nextval, #{ hotelNo }, #{ userNo }, #{ cleanliness }, #{ comfort }, #{ location }, #{ facilities }, #{ staff }, sysdate)
